amendment.description: Amendment provides for the consideration of the bill H.R. 3846, to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to increase the minimum wage, and for other purposes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment which inserts a new section 2 into the resolution and which has the effect of striking section 5 of H.R. 3846.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
